titleStmt.title: A contention for honour and riches. By I.S.
titleStmt.author: Shirley, James, 1596-1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E[lizabeth] A[llde] for William Cooke, and are to be sold at his shop neere Furnivals Inne gate in Holborne,
